20110122030012.000|20110122030014.000|TR0|We have breaking news tonight.  One of the 
20110122030014.000|20110122030016.000|TR0|most controversial voices on television, 
20110122030016.000|20110122030018.000|TR0|not to mention a fierce competitor and a

20110122031835.000|20110122031837.000|TR0|So, relations had so badly deteriorated
